body.content:
Dear John

How are you and i hope all is well with you and your family first i
want to inform you that my fathers funds is been deposited in the bank
of African Benin republic before his death and now the funds was
deposited in his names and i need you to help me put claims over the
funds as i have all the legal deposit documents from my dad ,


but my challenge is to finance my family  lawyer  who will help me
process the needed funds release documents including the change of
ownership certificate from the high court which requires some amount
of fees and i also want you to know that i need a partner who will
support me in pay off the lawyer and the bank fees and i also promise
to offer %30 of the total amount to any one who will help me in
claiming the funds ,


and you must have a good account that can be able to receive my funds
in safe conditions before my arrival in your country for an investment
project ,


Please if you are willing to help me please send to me your requested
details as stated below

YOUR(1) Full Name:============
YOUR(2) Occupation:===========
YOUR(3) Age:================
YOUR(4) Telephone Number:===========
YOUR(5) Address:==============
YOUR(6) Country;============
YOUR(7) Identity card;============


Immediately i get your details i will send you the Bank details as
well for you to contact them on my behalf as i will be here given you
all important info


i  have attache to you a copy of the legal documents as a prof and i
will send you more details including my identity card  when i hear
from you with your details as required ,



Mr Collins Bamba Issiaka
My Whatsapp Number
MOBILE +229-53-27-64-83

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
